title: Watch: At JPM, former drug regulator Richard Pazdur rings the alarm about politics at FDA
description: Here's full footage from a STAT event with former top FDA official Richard Pazdur, who expressed grave concern about politicization at the agency.
content: Here's full footage from a STAT event with former top FDA official Richard Pazdur, who expressed grave concern about politicization at the agency.
